ca.utoronto.utm.paint

Class Squiggle

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Shape
      • ca.utoronto.utm.paint.Squiggle

  • public class Squiggle
extends Shape
    Squiggle, subclass of Shape An object made up of connected dots. Draws lines based on it's current list of points.
    Author:
    CSC207 Group
